        Parameters:

        is - - The countable item, the amount of the item is ignored (calculated as 1)
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        is - - The ItemStack in which the variables should be filled
        vars - - The fillable variables
        Returns:

      • getItem

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getItem(java.lang.String name)
        Get the numeric id of the given itemname, it works for both numeric and text ids.
        Parameters:
        name - the case insensitive material name of the item or the numeric id of the item.
        Returns:
        the numeric id of the requested item or 1, if the given name is incorrect or null

      • getLoreStorageMeta

        public static java.lang.String getLoreStorageMeta(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack is,
                                                  java.lang.String format,
                                                  java.lang.String def)
        Gets the given lore storage meta from the given ItemStack
        Parameters:
        is - - The checkable ItemStack
        format - - The format of the storage meta
        def - - Default value to return if the meta was not found.
        Returns:
        The first found compatible lore storage meta or def if not found any.

      • itemEqual

        public static boolean itemEqual(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item1,
                                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item2)
        A truth check for two items, if they are actually totally same or not
        Parameters:
        item1 - first item of the equal checking
        item2 - second item of the equal checking
        Returns:
        True if the two itemstack contains exactly the same abilities (id, count, durability, metadata), false otherwise

      • itemFromNBTJson

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemFromNBTJson(java.lang.String str)
        Converts an NBT JSON String to an ItemStack
        Parameters:
        str - - Convertable NBT JSON String
        Returns:
        Conversion result

      • itemSimilar

        public static boolean itemSimilar(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item1,
                                  org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item2)
        A truth check for two items, if they type is actually totally same or not. The only allowed difference between the stacks could be only their count.
        Parameters:
        item1 - first item of the similiar checking
        item2 - second item of the similiar checking
        Returns:
        True if the two itemstack contains exactly the same abilities (id, durability, metadata), the item counts could be different; false otherwise.

        Returns:

        Converts an ItemStack to it's representing string
        Parameters:
        in - convertable ItemStack
        Returns:
        the conversion output String or "0:-1 0" if the given ItemStack is null

      • itemToString

        public static java.lang.String itemToString(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack in,
                                            boolean useNBT)
        Converts an ItemStack to it's representing string with the option to store all NBT tags of the item
        Parameters:
        in - - The convertable ItemStack
        useNBT - - Store every nbt tag of the item
        Returns:
        The conversion output String or "0:-1 0" if the given ItemStack is null

      • loadInv

                           org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inv)
        Converts a map representation of a saved inventory to an actual Inventory. Completely overrides all the existing items in the inventory.
        Parameters:
        map - - The map containing the items and their slots of the saved inventory
